visits.text: Grand Mosque of Sultan Qaboos (exterior, prayer halls, courtyard and chandelier)
Mutrah: corniche, souk and Fort Mutrah (panoramas)
Old Muscat: Al Alam palace (exteriors), Jalali and Mirani forts (exteriors)
Al Qurum Beach: sunset walk
Sayq Plateau (Jebel Akhdar): terraces and rose gardens
Wadi Bani Habib: ruins of abandoned villages
Mutrah Corniche: morning stroll and fish market
Al Qurum Beach: relaxation and swimming
Muscat: National Museum or Oman Across Ages Museum (your choice) for Omani heritage
Old port of Sidab and walk to Riyam Park district (view over the bay)

activities.text: Controlled ascent (4x4 checkpoint) to the plateau, viewpoints and short walks
Boat trip from Marina Bandar Al Rowdha: dolphin watching and snorkeling at Bandar Khayran
Free time for last handicraft purchases (frankincense, silver, decorative khanjars)

OMAN IN 10 DAYS: WADIS, DESERT AND GRAND CANYONS

visits.text: Nizwa: circular fort and old souks (date palms, silver, pottery)
Old town of Nizwa: traditional quarter and ramparts
Wadi Ghul (Grand Canyon of Oman): viewpoints
Jebel Shams: Balcony Walk (trail W6 on the ledge)
Misfat Al Abriyeen: oasis village and terraced aflaj

activities.text: Desert route ➜ Nizwa via Bidiyah and Izki
Mountain driving: Nizwa ➜ Jebel Shams plateau ➜ Misfat ➜ return

days_plan.itin_title: OMAN IN 10 DAYS: WADIS, DESERT AND GRAND CANYONS
OMAN IN 10 DAYS: WADIS, DESERT AND GRAND CANYONS

visits.text: Wadi Shab: approach walk, swimming in pools and cave
Sur: corniche, dhow shipyards and Al Ayjah lighthouse
Wadi Tiwi: valley road, villages of Mibam and falajs
Al Ayjah: historic quarter and watchtower

activities.text: Boat crossing at the entrance to Wadi Shab
Walks and swimming breaks in the pools of Wadi Tiwi

days_plan.itin_title: OMAN IN 10 DAYS: WADIS, DESERT AND GRAND CANYONS

visits.text: Bandar Al Khayran: coastal viewpoints near Qantab
Hawiyat Najm Park (Bimmah Sinkhole)
Tiwi: beach and coastal hamlets

days_plan.itin_title: OMAN IN 10 DAYS: WADIS, DESERT AND GRAND CANYONS

visits.text: Wadi Bani Khalid: turquoise pools and main falaj
Sharqiya Sands: dunes at sunset

activities.text: Off-road/sand driving from Al Wasil to the heart of the dunes (with 4x4)
Walking on dune ridges and stargazing
